definitions: Someone or something living at the same time, or of roughly the same age as another.; Something existing at the same time.; From the same time period, coexistent in time.; Modern, of the present age.
examples: Cervantes was a contemporary of Shakespeare; The works are from different historical periods but share similar themes. Cervantes and Shakespeare lived during overlapping times in history. Contemporary architecture reflects modern design principles while recalling classical styles; Her artwork is often inspired by current events, making it seem very much alive with its subject matter.
